kit.leader_skill: "Low-Class Warrior" or "Peppy Gals" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Hunting Arrow (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Fasha's Proposal
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 50% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; For 5 turns from the character's entry turn: Guards all attacks; Starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; Great chance of performing a critical hit; For every attack received: (Forever) ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 200%); When another 2 or more "Low-Class Warrior" Category allies are on the team, or when another 2 or more "Peppy Gals" Category allies are on the team: (Forever) ATK & DEF 40% up whenever guard is activated (up to 200%)

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack

lines.context: For 5 turns from the character's entry turn
Starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn

lines.text: Great chance of performing a critical hit
lines.context: Starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn
For every attack received

lines.text: ATK & DEF 40% up whenever guard is activated (up to 200%)
lines.context: When another 2 or more "Low-Class Warrior" Category allies are on the team, or when another 2 or more "Peppy Gals" Category allies are on the team
